item.title: Probing the Skin-Brain Axis: New Vistas Using Mouse Models
item.description: Pubmed Link MDPI link DOI Copyright and License Information Authors: Aliće Weiglein,Evelyn Gaffal and Anne Albrecht Copyright © 2022 by the authors. Licensee MDPI, Basel, Switzerland. This article is an open access article distributed under the terms and conditions of the Creative Commons Attribution (CC BY) license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/). Abstract Inflammatory diseases of the skin, including atopic dermatitis and psoriasis, have gained increasing attention with rising incidences in developed countries over the past decades.
